channel.title: Forum Danganronpa! 2.0 "Hope's" Peak Academy (Setting Killing Game Up) [15/16]
channel.description:
Welcome to Hope's Peak Academy!
**Game Set up**
1) Each player much choose a skill to be 'Ultimate' of - this must be unique to you, and can not be the same as any other players 2) if anyone wants their Ultimate hidden with the use of ??? you may request this when you pm your Ultimate but expect consequences 3) I can refuse any Ultimate if I feel as they don't fit 4) I ask everyone in there pm provide a backstory as to whom they are gonna be playing 5) The game will mostly be conducted via PMs, with only general assembly announcements and class trials taking place in the thread.
**Game Mechanics**
1) Most basic actions are free (walking, talking, eating, picking up objects etc). 2) The game will be divided into 'Day' and 'Night' phases 3) Day will last from 7am - 10pm, with night lasting 10pm - 7am 4) Day phases will work in turns lasting 2 hours in game minutes with each turn taking 24 hours real time. Any action will last that amount of time except talking (which can be conducted via PMs i'm included in with people in the same room as you, but talk a lot and time will pass) Failure to act quickly may result in lost turns. 6) Night will proceed as I see fit, with various actions taking various amounts of time.
**Survival Essentials**
1) You must eat twice a day (Except Day 1, when you only need to eat once) or face escalating penalties. - Eating takes 1 hour - You may eat whenever you like, but each meal must be at least 3 hours apart 2) You must sleep 6 hours a night to avoid fatigue penalties. - You may sleep during the day instead, but it will take 50% longer to achieve the required amount. - You will be woken by all announcements (Morning, night, trail beginning, Assembly announcement, body discovery) - Interrupted sleep will require an additional hour to complete. 3) You must use a toilet within 3 hours of eating or face action penalties.
**Becoming 'Blackened**
1) You may contact me during any 'Daily life' phase (When no one has been murdered since the last trial) you may message me with your plan and ask permission to proceed. This is to prevent too many murder plots happening at once. Your chances of being approved are increased by a more intricate plan - be interesting! 2) Only the person I chose as a blackened, or someone they provoke, may kill 3) You may have an accomplice, but only the killer of the 1st victim will become the Blackened 4) You may not hide evidence in your own dorm or on your person
**Class Trial** 1) You must vote at the end of the trial 2) You cannot present false evidence, but you can lie as much as you wish.
*Sign ups* 1) NozBugz The Ultimate Sociopath 2) Moleland The Ultimate Fisherman 3) Queen_Alfa The Ultimate Herpetologist 4) Hippolytus The Ultimate Hipster 5) Strangle The Ultimate Detective 6) Frostwolf103 The Ultimate Hunter 7) Braixen The Ultimate Engineer 8) Simon The Ultimate Lucky 9) Icibalus The Ultimate Magician 10) Wolfy The Ultimate Lawyer 11) Insanity The Ultimate Liar 12) eevee The Ultimate potato farmer 13) PokemonKidRyan The Ultimate Karate Practitioner 14) KyoDaz Ultimate ??? 15) NuclearBurrito The Ultimate Informat 16) PolikShadowbliss The Ultimate Spy
(FUCKING DEAL WITH IT MOLE. I SEIZED THE MEANS OF HOSTING) (and I FadeBlade have been granted the right to host with the full permission of noz himself)
Maps ![Danganronpa Floor 1|690x388](upload://aYnDHWmmZDCAE6RsXReWNLwBEJ4.png)
REGULATIONS Rule #1: Students may reside only within the school. Leaving campus is an unacceptable use of time. Rule #2: "Nighttime" is from 10 pm to 7 am. Some areas are off-limits at night, so please exercise caution. Rule #3: Sleeping anywhere other than the dormitory will be seen as sleeping in class and punished accordingly. Rule #4: With minimal restrictions, you are free to explore Hope's Peak Academy at your discretion. Rule #5: Violence against Homeroom Teacher Monokuma is strictly prohibited, as is destruction of surveillance cameras. Rule #6: Anyone who kills a fellow student and becomes "blackened" will graduate, unless they are discovered. Rule #7: Additional school regulations may be added if necessary. Rule #8: Monokuma will never murder a student and become blackened
